title: Final reveal uses the user-provided uploaded image as a stable generated asset

requirements.summary: Ensure the final OneMoreThingInteraction reveal displays the user-provided uploaded photo via a stable static asset URL.
acceptanceCriteria: The final surprise view (step >= 3) renders the user-provided photo (from the upload "627674318_941888025190821_1390922055753035112_n.jpg") and not any other image.
The image is served as a static asset from `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and referenced via a `/assets/generated/...` URL (no backend image serving).
The image renders correctly in Chrome on Windows and still uses appropriate sizing (e.g., contained with a max height) and rounded corners consistent with the current theme.
There are no broken image links (no 404) when reaching the final surprise view.

file_operations.description: Replace/verify the generated asset so this exact file contains the user-provided uploaded photo (original filename: "627674318_941888025190821_1390922055753035112_n.jpg") and remains a clean, stable filename used by the UI.

Ensure the final reveal image uses a fixed static URL referencing the exact generated asset at `/assets/generated/shona-surprise.dim_724x962.jpg` (no random/placeholder selection), while keeping existing sizing/rounded-corner styling consistent with the current theme.
